name: os2borgerpc-nodejs
description: NodeJS application for compiling static (mostly Bootstrap) resources for admin_site

scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run postcss && npm run clean && npm run copy-bootstrap-js
scripts.build-sass: node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src -o dist/css/

author: Magenta ApS
